scenes.description: Transition scene with stage lights and audience cheering.
Omaru Polka performing "夢で逢えたら" (Yume de Aetara).

subtitles.original: Baby baby baby baby...
subtitles.english: Baby baby baby baby...

subtitles.original: 君の胸にキスをしたら
subtitles.english: If I kiss your chest

subtitles.original: 白い幻想的な水色の水着を溶かすなよ

subtitles.original: 君を乗せた宇宙船が
subtitles.english: The spaceship carrying you

subtitles.original: 夕暮れの彼方へ消えて

subtitles.original: 光るプラネタリウム

subtitles.english: Just hearing you say you like me

subtitles.original: 僕は嬉しいのさ
